meanings.definition: Having the same form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The two homomorphic shapes fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent2: The identical twins have homomorphic features.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see the homomorphic patterns on their matching outfits.
meanings.sent4: The symmetrical garden was a homomorphic paradise.
meanings.sent5: The mirror reflected a homomorphic image of the room.

meanings.definition: Preserving the relationships between elements under an operation.
meanings.sent1: The homomorphic function kept the connections intact.
meanings.sent2: The encryption method is homomorphic, ensuring data privacy.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to watch the homomorphic encryption puzzle hackers.
meanings.sent4: The homomorphic algorithm danced gracefully with the data.
meanings.sent5: The homomorphic transformation revealed hidden patterns in the data.
